title: Scrollbars should be disabled in ImageAnalyzer example
OB: When opening the ImageAnalyzer example in Build F2 (20020602) on Redhat 7.2 with GTK2KDE 2.210(GTK2 only), the scrollbars are enabled and can be moved around. However, they do not have any effect. Even when opening a small image such as an icon, the scrollbars are present but do not function as expected.
SR: 1. Open the ImageAnalyzer example. 2. Notice that the scrollbars are enabled and can be moved. 3. Open a small image, such as an icon. 4. Observe that the scrollbars are present but do not have any effect when moved.
